message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you a decent amount to start, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
Let's meet in the middle and split it evenly, no tricks!
You're being too generous, Bob! I'll take a bit more this time, but don't think you're getting off easy!
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't think you're getting it all!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give you all the power. Meet me in the middle, Bob!
